content:
Sure! Here are ten more game suggestions that incorporate multiplayer, but without any FPS or shooter games:

1. Minecraft - This is a sandbox game that lets players build and explore a blocky world filled with creatures, resources, and danger. It has a strong focus on creativity and player interaction, and it supports multiplayer for up to 10 players.
2. Animal Crossing: New Horizons - This is a life simulation game that lets players build and customize their own island paradise, complete with gardens, furniture, and friendly animal neighbors. It has a strong focus on relaxation and creativity, and it supports multiplayer for up to 8 players.
3. Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout - This is a multiplayer party game that challenges players to compete in wacky obstacle courses filled with challenges and pitfalls. It has a whimsical art style and a strong focus on fun and humor, and it supports multiplayer for up to 60 players.
4. Rocket Arena - This is a team-based game that combines elements of sports and shooters, as players blast each other with rockets and try to score goals. It has a bright and colorful art style and supports multiplayer for up to 6 players.
5. Among Us - This is a social deduction game that challenges players to find the imposter among their crewmates on a spaceship. It has a simple art style and requires communication and strategy to win, and it supports multiplayer for up to 10 players.
6. Overcooked 2 - This is a cooking simulation game that challenges players to work together to prepare and serve meals in a chaotic kitchen environment. It has a cute and colorful art style and supports multiplayer for up to 4 players.
7. Dead by Daylight - This is a multiplayer survival horror game that pits a team of survivors against a powerful killer in a variety of creepy locations. It has a dark and atmospheric art style and requires strategy and teamwork to survive, and it supports multiplayer for up to 5 players.
8. Raft - This is a survival simulation game that challenges players to build and maintain a raft while navigating a dangerous ocean filled with sharks and other hazards. It has a bright and colorful art style and supports multiplayer for up to 8 players.
9. Sea of Thieves - This is a pirate-themed adventure game that encourages players to explore the high seas, discover treasure, and engage in ship-to-ship combat. It has a whimsical art style and a strong focus on player interaction and collaboration, and it supports multiplayer for up to 4 players.
10. Valheim - This is an open-world survival game set in a mythical Norse world, where players must gather resources, craft gear, and defeat powerful enemies to progress. It has a beautiful and atmospheric art style and supports multiplayer for up to 10 players.

I hope these suggestions help you find a multiplayer game that suits your interests!
